summary: Comprehensive testing of BauDok project management extension with new documentation improvement features completed. Backend 100% functional, frontend working with minor UI interaction fixes applied.
passed_tests: GET /api/tags - predefined tags endpoint (13 tags returned)
Upload image with comma-separated tags functionality
Upload image with GPS location (lat, lng, address) functionality
Link two images together using linked_image_id field
Filter images by tag in API responses
All CRUD operations for projects and images
Tag selection UI in upload dialog
GPS location button in upload dialog
Tag filter dropdown in frontend (fixed SelectItem issue)
Image lightbox with tag editing capabilities
